pkgmetadata.longdescription: Jack-Knife Support for Evolutionary Distinctiveness Indices I and W // These functions calculate the taxonomic measures presented in Miranda-Esquivel (2016). The package introduces Jack-knife resampling in evolutionary distinctiveness prioritization analysis, as a way to evaluate the support of the ranking in area prioritization, and the persistence of a given area in a conservation analysis. The algorithm is described in: Miranda- Esquivel, D (2016) DOI:10.1007/978-3-319-22461-9_11.
